New Records: Anrich Nortje finished with career-best figures of 4-0-7-4
Key Match Events: Anrich Nortje dismissed Kamindu Mendis, Kusal Mendis, Charith Asalanka, and Angelo Mathews
Ottniel Baartman took control of the innings and conceded only three off his first two overs
Wanindu Hasaranga was stumped off his second ball and Sadeera Samarawickrama was bowled by one after it
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played on a drop-in pitch that was tricky and quick, and batting was hellishly difficult
The surface seemed to be two-paced, with some deliveries shot by faster than a New York minute and others hardly bouncing ankle high
Others: A crowd of 12,500 locals travelled out on the Long Island Rail Road to watch the game
The game was part of the T20 World Cup 2024, which is being hosted in New York for the first time
